homePage.companyDescription: Sobriety World specializes in providing a wide range of smartphones and accessories at competitive wholesale prices. We aim to deliver the latest technology and high-quality mobile solutions to businesses and distributors worldwide. Our company is committed to offering products that meet the highest quality standards, along with exceptional customer service and pricing designed to support the profitability of our partners.
homePage.aboutUsContent: Founded in Baghdad, Sobriety World specializes in providing a wide range of smartphones and accessories at competitive wholesale prices. We are committed to delivering high-quality products that meet the needs of our customers in both local and international markets.
homePage.contactUsContent: Feel free to send us a message

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Al-Bara’a Law Office is a prestigious legal firm offering specialized legal consultations and representation across various fields, with a focus on criminal, commercial, and civil law. The office is led by Jaafar AL Maliki, an experienced judge and lawyer with over twenty-five years in judiciary and legal practice. Our commitment to excellence ensures that we provide high-quality legal services, aiming to deliver justice and protect the rights of our clients.

services.1: Specialized Legal Consultations: Offering expert advice in areas such as criminal law, family law, labor law, contracts, commercial law, and civil law.
services.2: Court Representation: Representing clients in civil, commercial, and criminal courts, handling complex cases with thorough analysis of evidence and strong defense preparation.
services.3: Legal Research and Case Analysis: Conducting advanced legal research, analyzing cases, and preparing customized litigation strategies for our clients.

specializations.1: Criminal Law: Defending clients in complex criminal cases, preparing appropriate defenses, and analyzing criminal evidence.
specializations.2: Family Law: Handling family-related cases such as divorce, child custody, and property division.
specializations.3: Commercial Law: Providing legal consultation and representation in business disputes, commercial contracts, and arbitration.
specializations.4: Civil Law: Addressing civil matters, including contract disputes, personal status laws, and civil liabilities.

Goals.1: Achieving Justice: We aim to represent our clients with the highest standards of professionalism, ensuring justice is served fairly.
Goals.2: Contributing to Legal Development: We are committed to enhancing legal understanding through participation in workshops and legal training.
Goals.3: Protecting Rights: We focus on safeguarding the human and legal rights of our clients in accordance with current laws and regulations.

aboutUs.historyContent: Al-Bara’a Law Office was founded by Jaafar AL Maliki, a former judge with extensive experience in criminal, commercial, and civil law. Over the course of his career, the founder has held several key judicial positions:

historyList.1: Lawyer and Judge: Jaafar AL Maliki has over 25 years of experience practicing law, including serving as a judge in civil and commercial courts in Baghdad and Basra.
historyList.2: Commercial Court Judge: Presided over complex commercial disputes and contract cases as a judge at the Commercial Court in Basra.
historyList.3: Civil Court Judge: Oversaw civil cases in several courts, including Basra and Maqil.
historyList.4: Family Court Judge: Led family court cases in Sadr City, handling complex family matters and ensuring the protection of family rights.
historyList.5: Advisor in Corruption and Immigration Cases: Developed investigation procedures for corruption and immigration cases, and supervised Interpol inquiries at the highest levels.

publications.1: Editor-in-Chief: Supervised the publication of the 'Legal Truth' magazine from 2008 to 2016, specializing in legal affairs.
publications.2: Legal Articles: Authored numerous articles in the Iraqi Judicial Council newspaper and legal digital magazine, discussing various legal issues.
publications.3: Television Programs: Featured in a prominent television show, 'Legal Files', which focused on important legal matters in Iraq.
publications.4: Notable Judicial Decisions: Delivered key legal rulings in the Federal Court and Basra Court of Appeal, including cases on civil rights protection and legislative annulment.

trainings.1: Rule of Law and Judicial Reform: Organized by the U.S. Department of Justice.
trainings.2: Cross-Border Crimes and Judicial Cooperation: Organized by the European Union.
trainings.3: International Commercial Arbitration: Organized by the U.S. Embassy in Iraq.
trainings.4: Money Laundering and Financial Crimes: Organized by the United Nations.
trainings.5: Institute of Criminal Sciences: Specialized training in Italy.

achievements.1: Legal Truth Magazine: Led the editorial team of a prominent legal magazine published from 2008 to 2016.
achievements.2: Published Articles: Authored articles featured in the Iraqi Judicial Council newspaper and online legal platforms.
achievements.3: Television Program: Appeared in a television program titled 'Legal Files', discussing significant legal issues in Iraq.
